text: Hiya, any way to restrict emails by the owner/team? I.e. everyone can create emails and send them, but only see the ones they own or are in their team?

I have a client unhappy that their logo is being used by FB when someone links to a blog listing page, Anyone know if there’s a GOOD way to set a featured image for a blog listing page? if not we can throw stuff in the head and check if is_listing_page, just feel like implementing this could be a problem down the road if there IS a HS way of doing this
Unfortunately the permissions don’t get that granular.
make the logo a background image?

eh, not a fan of that method - just means it’s going to use an icon or something instead.

Would be fine with it using the logo - it’s just that Facebook crops it since the logo image itself is not the same aspect ratio as their share areas
would rather be able to set that image. and it only makes sense to be able to do that since HS added the feature to pages
You can add the OG tags with the image you want it to use.
yes, that’s what I’m likely going to do, but will suggest FB add the feature to listing pages as it just makes sense to have that if they’re adding it across the boardanyways
Is there a way to omit the HubSpot default form styling when using the beta form field?
<@U26DA9CQ0> uploaded a file: <https://HubSpotdev.slack.com/files/U26DA9CQ0/FAGJ4QVK3/screen_shot_2018-05-02_at_11.43.55_am.png|Screen Shot 2018-05-02 at 11.43.55 AM.png>
<@U26DA9CQ0> uploaded a file: <https://HubSpotdev.slack.com/files/U26DA9CQ0/FAH4SFHBL/screen_shot_2018-05-02_at_11.45.40_am.png|Screen Shot 2018-05-02 at 11.45.40 AM.png>
Actually I don’t think there are any default styles attached to it.
We have a user using the new Quote tool in HubSpot sales. Is there a place to put your job title so you dont have to manually add it everytime you do a quote?
There used to be a field in profile and preferences for job title no?

Howdy! I have been making changes to a module in the new IDE and, among other things, I changed the module name. Now, both in preview and when added to a page, I get the following message `This module does not have any editable options.`. Any suggestions on how to get this fixed?
I cloned the module and the problem still persists in the cloned one as well
